job_title: IT SAP Business Analyst for Commercial Order Management
jd: From: abhishek, StellentIT abhishek@stellentit.com Reply to: abhishek@stellentit.com SAP CRM Order Management,100% Remote12+ MonthsPhone + Skype Minimum QualificationsFive years of recent SAP work experience in Order management, Utilizing SAP CRM order entry process.SAP-CRM integration of specific fields, Order prerequisites, Customer and material Master data fields export to SAP-CRM.Flat fee / Service contracts in SAP-CRM.Returns, Free of charge, Consignment etc ordersLegal and government monthly order reporting, Customer order reports, Delivery reports, EDI communication.Job DescriptionA Mindset client is looking for an IT SAP Business Analyst for Commercial Order Management to join the Global EBS (Enterprise Business Solutions) team. This person will lead development and deployment work related to the SAP SD modules and process design.What You Will Do:• Actively involved in the preparation, conception, realization, Go Live and Hypercare of the SAP Global Template and localization implementation project.• Providing a creative source of ideas/solutions to address solution gaps and issues identified during Solution Confirmation workshops• Get involved and ensure standard SAP solution usage and be able to provide workarounds where required and not supported by the existing Global Template based on business scenarios• Customize/Configure SAP landscape while developing complex requirements for process or system solutions within the business domain leveraging multiple business requirements gathering methodologies to identify business, functional, and non-functional requirements• Maintain expert product knowledge using an analytical approach to identifying opportunities for enhancements• Develop and execute plans and organize work to ensure efficient delivery of results to meet business expectations
